original_text: Elijah said to the king, ‘This is what the Lord says: You sent men to speak to Ekron's god, Baal-Zebub, to find out what would happen to you. Did you think that there is no God in Israel? You did not ask him what would happen. Because of that, you will not leave the bed that you are lying on. You will certainly die.’
korean_text: 말하되 여호와의 말씀이 네가 사자를 보내 에그론의 신 바알세붑에게 물으려 하니 이스라엘에 그의 말을 물을 만한 하나님이 안 계심이냐 그러므로 네가 그 올라간 침상에서 내려오지 못할지라 네가 반드시 죽으리라 하셨다 하니라

sentences.original_text: You sent men to speak to Ekron's god, Baal-Zebub
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 에그론의 신 바알세붑에게 보내어 말하게 했다

sentences.original_text: to find out what would happen to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 너에게 무슨 일이 일어날지 알아보기 위해

sentences.original_text: Did you think that there is no God in Israel?
You did not ask him what would happen.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그에게 무슨 일이 일어날지 묻지 않았다

sentences.original_text: you will not leave the bed that you are lying on.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 누워있는 침대를 떠나지 못할 것이다
